Module org.jnetpcap
Package org.jnetpcap

Class PcapActivatedException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
org.jnetpcap.PcapException
org.jnetpcap.PcapActivatedException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PcapActivatedException extends PcapException
Indicates that an operation is not permitted on an already activated pcap handle.
Author:
Sly Technologies Inc, repos@slytechs.com
